name: VaccineBuddy
0:
”Alexa, start vaccine buddy”
”Alexa, ask vaccine buddy to add new schedule”
”Show vaccine schedule”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: vaccine buddy
des:
This is vaccine schedule reminder skill.

Some cool features of Vaccine Buddy skill are:

1.If you have baby and want to be reminded to schedule an appointment with health care provider. So Vaccine buddy will assist you to get reminders before your child’s 2, 4, 6, 12, 18 month immunizations based on your baby’s date of birth.
2.As a parent it is very important to remember to take kid for vaccination, but sometime due to work load or other priorities we forget. Here Alexa can make parents Life easy with this simple Life hack. 
3.Vaccine buddy would also useful for other family members to set reminders for medical checkup etc.
4.Parents will get reminders, can update vaccine schedule, can see statistic of vaccine of kids on Echo Show and Echo spot as well. 
5.Echo show and spot would have graphical view to show missed vaccines etc. 
6.When will I get reminders? - A text message will be sent one month and one week before the next vaccination milestone to remind you’re to call your health care provider to schedule your next vaccination appointment. 
7.Find easy-to-read vaccine schedules for all ages.
8.You will get reminders over SMS/Call/Mail which would save your time and extra headache. Also taking kid to vaccination on time would definitely help you and your Family.
9.You don’t need to write down about vaccines on card or smartphone. Alexa will take care and mark as done. If not done she will remind you again ?

Sample phrases that you can play with 
1.Alexa, ask vaccine buddy to add new schedule 
2.Alexa start vaccine buddy
3.Alexa ask vaccine buddy to show vaccine schedule 
4.Create new schedule
5.Show vaccine schedule
6.Mark as done
7.Set reminder please

Feel free to add your feedback and review, which would help us to improve

Team Vaccine Buddy
